code: import React from'react';import'./pagination.scss';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Pagination=function Pagination(_ref){var itemsPerPage=_ref.itemsPerPage,totalItems=_ref.totalItems,paginate=_ref.paginate;var pageNumbers=[];for(var i=1;i<=Math.ceil(totalItems/itemsPerPage);i++){pageNumbers.push(i);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"pagination",children:pageNumbers.map(function(number){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"pagination__page-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:function onClick(){return paginate(number);},className:"btn pagination__btn",children:number})},number);})})});};export default Pagination;
